org.jsonurl.util

Class PercentCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsonurl.util.PercentCodec

  • public final class PercentCodec
extends Object
    A utility class for encoding/decoding percent encoded UTF-8 sequences.
    Since:
    2020-11-01
    Author:
    jsonurl.org, David MacCormack

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        public static int decode(CharIterator text)
                  throws IOException
        Get the next codepoint, percent decoding if necessary.
        Parameters:
        text - a valid CharIterator
        Returns:
        a UNICODE codepoint
        Throws:
        IOException

      • decode

        public static int decode(CharIterator text,
                         boolean decodePlus)
                  throws IOException
        Get the next codepoint, percent decoding if necessary.
        Parameters:
        text - a valid CharIterator
        decodePlus - if true, decode + as though it was %20
        Returns:
        a UNICODE codepoint
        Throws:
        IOException

      • encode

        public static void encode(Appendable dest,
                          String[] hexEncode,
                          CharSequence text,
                          int start,
                          int end)
                   throws IOException
        Percent encode the given CharSequence as a sequence of UTF-8 octets.
        Parameters:
        dest - destination
        hexEncode - lookup table for each character
        text - source text
        start - start position
        end - end position
        Throws:
        IOException

      • encode

        public static void encode(Appendable dest,
                          int codePoint,
                          String[] hexEncode,
                          int position)
                   throws IOException
        Percent encode the given codepoint as a sequence of UTF-8 octets.
        Parameters:
        dest - destination
        codePoint - a UNICODE codepoint
        hexEncode - lookup table
        position - text position (passed to MalformedInputException)
        Throws:
        IOException
